about-me.presentation: HelloðŸ‘‹ I'm 24 years old and a full-stack JavaScript developer. After obtaining my degree in electronic systems and computing, I chose to specialize in web development. I now have nearly two years of experience as a full-stack JavaScript developer!

overcraft.name: Overcraft
overcraft.description: Overcraft is a platform where StarCraft 2 players can create, organize, and share their build orders to better learn and optimize their strategies. It offers an interactive mode with a timer to execute builds in real-time, as well as customization and editing options.

web-cv.name: Web CV
web-cv.description: My Web CV is a modern and interactive application developed with Next.js, offering smooth navigation and an optimized experience with a polished interface and dark mode. It is designed to present my background in a professional and dynamic way. ðŸš€

projet-ulysseus.name: Ulysseus Project
projet-ulysseus.description: Development of applications for the Ulysseus alliance of institutions. The main technologies are JavaScript, Python, Linux, and Docker.

licence.name: Bachelor's in Embedded Systems
licence.description: Programming languages: C / C++ and VHDL (PIC16, ARDUINO, STM32). Real-time OS with FreeRTOS. Linux and Windows operating systems.

bts.name: BTS Digital Systems
bts.description: Study of circuit diagrams, design and troubleshooting on electronic boards, signal analysis, Arduino programming, HTML/CSS.
